TopicTitle: Make field "tests" public in EngineersReport class

Articles.Content:
https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/api/class_k_s_p_1_1_u_i_1_1_screens_1_1_engineers_report.html

The stock Engineer's Report has most of its functionality hidden in private methods and fields. Even by extending it and hijacking the icon, I still can't access the existing tests, and extract information from them (such as which ones are passed/failed, and how high their notification level is).

I'd like that the 'tests' field be made public (or protected, but preferably public), so I can work on a parallel notification (while keeping the stock app).

Or give us some other way of accessing them, like a get() version that returns a copy?
i'd still like this to be implemented, if possible
